Class OAuthDesktopMobileAuthCodeGrant

java.lang.Object
  com.microsoft.bingads.Authentication
      com.microsoft.bingads.internal.OAuthWithAuthorizationCode
          com.microsoft.bingads.OAuthDesktopMobileAuthCodeGrant

public class OAuthDesktopMobileAuthCodeGrant
extends OAuthWithAuthorizationCode

Represents an OAuth authorization object implementing the authorization code grant flow for use in a desktop or mobile application.
